name: 2023 the 6th International Conference on Robotics and Mechatronics (ICRoM 2023)
content: Publication: All submitted papers will be peer-reviewed by technical committee and reviewers of the conference. Accepted paper will be included into ICRoM 2023 Conference Proceedings, which will be published into Journal of Physics: Conference Series (JPCS), and submitted for indexing by Ei Compendex and Scopus.
